de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui

Class GuiTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui.GuiElement
      • de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui.GuiNode
        • de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui.GuiTransition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGuiElement, IGuiNode, IGuiTransition, IHasZValue, ISelectable, IElement, INode, ITransition

    public class GuiTransition
extends GuiNode
implements IGuiTransition
    Implements the transitions for the GUI model of the Petri net.

    This means that they have properties which play a role in the GUI only. (e.g. size of nodes, colors)
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

      A transition is enabled if:

      - Only output places that are input places as well have a token.

        name - The name of this transition

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Description copied from interface: ITransition
        A transition is enabled if:
        - It has at least one input place,
        - All input places have a token,
        - It has at least one output place,
        - Only output places that are input places as well have a token.
        Specified by:
        isEnabled in interface ITransition
        Returns:
        The "enabled" state of this transition.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean newState)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiTransition
        Sets the "enabled" attribute of this transition.

        Note: The transition in the GUI model has a Setter for this state, while the transition in the Data model determines its state by itself.
        Specified by:
        setEnabled in interface IGuiTransition
        Parameters:
        newState - The new "enabled" state

      • isSafe

        public boolean isSafe()
        Description copied from interface: ITransition
        A transition is safe if:
        - Output places have no token
        - Only output places that are input places as well have a token.
        Specified by:
        isSafe in interface ITransition
        Returns:
        The "safe" state of this transition.

        Specified by:
        setSafe in interface IGuiTransition
        Parameters:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.awt.Point p)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiElement
        Checks if a Point is within the shape.

        Note that this refers to the shape of this node itself (place, transition) only. It does not take the area of the label into account!
        Specified by:
        contains in interface IGuiElement
        Parameters:
        p - the Point to check
        Returns:
        true if the Point is within the shape

      • getArcAnchor

        public java.awt.Point getArcAnchor(java.awt.Point target)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiNode
        This method returns the anchor location for an arc from/towards the node. This anchor is located at the border of the node.
        Specified by:
        getArcAnchor in interface IGuiNode
        Parameters:
        target - The target/source of the arc
        Returns:
        The position for start/end of an arc
